title: Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis
description: Implemented ABSA using RNN with attention and FastText embeddings, and fine-tuned BERT-based models focusing on aspect-specific context. Includes data preprocessing and performance comparison.

title: CustomShell
description: Custom shell in C supporting commands like cd, help, I/O redirection, and user-defined operations (add, mul, factorial, strrev). Uses Makefile for build automation.

title: WiFi Communication Simulator
description: OOP-based simulator for WiFi 4/5/6 communication. Models CSMA/CA, MU-MIMO, and OFDMA to analyze throughput and latency with varying users and protocols.

title: NewsWave
description: NewsWave is a local news web app that displays top headlines from multiple categories using NewsAPI. It runs locally without requiring a backend.

title: Urban Spice
description: Urban Spice is a complete restaurant website built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. It offers smooth navigation with menu, booking, and contact features.

title: Product Landing Page
description: A dynamic product landing page created using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Wow.js. It simulates an online store with smooth scrolling and interactive animations.
